sentences.en: It was spread because the tribespeople indulged in ritual cannibalism.
sentences.cn: 该病的传播是由于部族人过度地按宗教仪式嗜食人肉.

sentences.en: Much prion type diseases can be caused by cannibalism.
sentences.cn: 很多朊病毒类型的疾病是由同类相食所导致的.

sentences.en: The incidence of the disease has dropped sharply since the practice of cannibalism has been abandoned.
sentences.cn: 但自从同类相食的行为被抛弃后,这种病的发生率锐减.

sentences.en: The Outlaws of Marsh " described many cannibalism plots. "
sentences.cn: 《水浒传 》 有很多食人情节的描写.

sentences.en: The war is just like the cannibalism of animals.
sentences.cn: 战争就如同动物之间的互相残杀.

sentences.en: They were forced to practise cannibalism in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 为了生存，他们被迫同类相食。

words.tran_cn: 食同类的；吃人肉的；凶残的
同类相食的，自相残杀的；食人肉的
调拨人员；拆用配件；同类相食
拆用…的配件；调拨…的人员
食人；嗜食同类；残忍的行为

trans.tran_en: If a group of people practise cannibalism, they eat the flesh of other people
